overseer_detect_harlan.text: Travis... this signature is familiar. Harlan Voss. My father.

overseer_lastsigns_intro.text: Harlan's trail isn't cold yet. There's more out there. I can feel it.

overseer_comment_coords.text: These coordinates... they're close. Too close. Something happened here.

overseer_find_note.text: There's something under the rubble. Paper. Old. Human.

overseer_beforebombs_intro.text: That key fragment... it's Vault-Tec. They took me. They took us.

overseer_comment_vaultsurface.text: This place... I remember screaming. Metal doors. Cold hands.

overseer_detect_logs.text: Those logs... they're about me. About Jax. About what they did.

overseer_find_keycard.text: That keycard opens the sublevel. That's where they took me.

overseer_sublevel_open.text: This is it. The truth is below.

overseer_lasttrail_intro.text: Harlan was close. Too close. This is where everything changed.

overseer_comment_rangercamp.text: This camp... I remember voices. Fear. My dad was here.

overseer_detect_tape03.text: That holotape... this is the last one he ever recorded.

overseer_canyon_memory.text: This canyon... I remember being carried. Cold. Dead. Alive.

overseer_find_finalnote.text: There's something wedged under the rocks. Paper. Old. Human.

overseer_panic.text: Travis— wait— don't touch him yet— I'm not ready.

overseer_breakdown.text: That's my body. I remember that scar. I remember that shirt. I remember being alive.

overseer_fragmented.text: I don't know who I am anymore. Him? Me? Both?

overseer_stabilize.text: Thank you... I feel lighter. Like a weight lifted.

overseer_conflicted.text: I don't know what comes next... but I'm ready.

overseer_memory_glitch_02.text: Dad... I— I remember— no— I don't—

overseer_memory_glitch_03.text: Subject J77. Neural echo detected. Fragment unstable.

overseer_endingA.text: Thank you... for letting him rest. For letting me rest.

overseer_endingB.text: He's out there. Wandering. And I'm... I'm not okay.

overseer_endingC.text: He's alive. I'm alive. I don't know what that means... but I'm ready.
